calcLoopEnrichment.Rd

Calculate loop enrichment over background.

Usage

scoreInteractions(
  x,
  hicFile,
  loopCalls,
  fgSize = 0,
  bg = "bowtie",
  bgGap = 0,
  bgSize = 5,
  pseudo,
  pruneUnder = 0,
  truncate = F,
  resolution,
  norm = "KR"
)
